revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Rusturf Tunnel |image = [[File:Rusturf Tunnel.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Rusturf Tunnel. |tokens = 14,000 |location = North of Verdanturf Town, east of Route 116. }} '''Rusturf Tunnel''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 400,000 HP.
==Pokémon and Dungeon Stats== <!--T:2-->
<!--T:3--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Whismur.png|40px]] Whismur || [[File:Hiker.png|40px]] Hiker Mike || [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude, [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude, [[File:Machop.png|40px]] Machop |- |}
<!--T:4--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | colspan=2|<center> N/A || [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena || <center> 900,000 |}

<tabs> <!--T:6--> <tab name="No Debuff">

<tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:8-->
<!--T:9--> After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items in Hoenn will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
<!--T:10--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !!
